category.name: LDAP
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: LDAP_admin_dn
preference.preference_description: Defines the user name used by the synchronization tool to connect to the LDAP server. The user name is the distinguished name (DN) of a LDAP user with search and read permissions in the LDAP system. The user needn't have modification abilities in LDAP. Valid Values: Accepts a single string as a value. Must be the DN of a LDAP user with search and read permissions in the LDAP system.
